I thought the shirt was going to fit more snugly but it didn't,  there was a lot of room left without it looking baggie if that makes sense. The shirt covered my butt and I paired it with mLeggings.

This is the perfect long sleeve shirt for under sweaters. It’s comfortable, fits well and doesn’t shrink in the wash. I have been wearing it under a button down long sweater and it’s flattering without being too tight. And I’m going to wear it under a cable knit sweater for warmth in NYC!

I’m so glad I got three of these on a black Friday sale! They’re incredibly soft, look great on and are light weight so that they can be worn all year long. The fabric seems to be like real cotton, even though it’s not. Very soft, very breathable. The colors look great, very true to the pictures. I probably could’ve done with a small, but the medium fits perfectly in the shoulders and under the arms so there’s plenty of room in the waist in case it shrinks. They are not too dressy, but will go well under blazers or sweaters for work or nice enough to go with jeans. Their lighter thickness will make it possible to layer in the cold weather or wear alone in Fall or Summer. Highly recommend.  I have to add that a lot of times I buy things on Amazon and they’re way too small, even though I usually wear a small. These run more true to size.
